description: In 2018, Steve Kroft reported on the immense power of Google, which had captured 90% of the market share for internet search and search advertising. At the time, Google's business practices were criticized by some as anticompetitive conduct. On Monday, a federal judge ruled in a landmark antitrust decision that Google has maintained an illegal monopoly over online search.
title: "The Real Power of Google" (2018) | 60 Minutes Archive

description: Pennsylvania Gov. Josh Shapiro spoke at the first Harris-Walz joint rally in Philadelphia on Tuesday. Shapiro was among the top running mate contenders Harris interviewed before ultimately selecting Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz. Political strategists Leslie Sanchez and Chuck Rocha join "America Decides" with analysis.
title: Pennsylvania Gov. Josh Shapiro speaks at first Harris-Walz rally

description: The best budget laptops of 2024 include powerful Chromebooks, ultralight HP notebooks and much more.
title: The best laptops under $500

description: Donald Trump is not mincing his words when it comes to Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz joining the 2024 Democratic presidential ticket. In a campaign fundraising email circulated Tuesday, the former president said Walz would be "the worst VP in history." Danielle Alvarez, senior adviser to the Trump campaign, joins "America Decides" to discuss.
title: Trump says Tim Walz would be "worst VP in history"

description: On Tuesday, Vice President Kamala Harris announced that Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz would be her 2024 running mate ahead of their first joint rally in Philadelphia. Pennsylvania Lt. Gov. Austin Davis joins "America Decides" with his reaction to the pick.
title: Pennsylvania lieutenant governor reacts to Harris' Tim Walz pick

description: Snoop Dogg has been winning fans with his droll commentary and enthusiasm at the 2024 Olympic Games.
title: Snoop Dogg's best moments at the Olympics so far

description: Despite a pandemic and social unrest in 2020 after the murder of George Floyd in Minnesota, voters gave Tim Walz a second term as governor. CBS News political reporter Hunter Woodall joins "America Decides" to look at Walz's rise in politics as he joins the 2024 Democratic presidential ticket.
title: How Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz rose through politics

description: Amit Elor's dominance was very real to her opponents. She had a 31-2 advantage over four matches and was not scored upon in her final three contests.
title: Amit Elor becomes youngest U.S. wrestler to win Olympic gold

description: Bloomberg Philanthropies is donating $600 million to the endowments of four historically Black medical schools. Michael Bloomberg, the former New York City mayor and billionaire founder of Bloomberg LP, said it "will empower new generations of Black doctors to create a healthier and more equitable future for our country."
title: Bloomberg philanthropy donating $600 million to Black medical schools

description: "This gift will empower new generations of Black doctors to create a healthier and more equitable future for our country," former NYC Mayor Michael Bloomberg said in a statement.
title: Bloomberg makes $600 million contribution to 4 Black medical schools

description: With the Democratic ticket complete, Vice President Kamala Harris and her new running mate, Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz, are about to make their first joint appearance in Philadelphia. CBS News' Nancy Cordes and Ed O'Keefe have the latest.
title: Harris, Walz to hold first joint rally in Philadelphia

description: Tim Walz spent 12 years in the House of Representatives before becoming Kamala Harris' running mate pick and being Minnesota's governor. CBS News congressional correspondent Nikole Killion looks back at his voting record and history in Congress.
title: How Tim Walz voted in Congress

description: Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz has spoken publicly about his and his wife's struggles with infertility.
title: For Tim Walz and his family, IVF is personal

description: A new study published in the journal Nature suggests ancestors of an early human species​ were slightly shorter than previously thought.
title: Discovery of "hobbit" fossils suggests tiny humans once roamed Indonesia

description: Vice President Kamala Harris announced today Tim Walz would be her VP running mate hours before their first rally together in Philadelphia.

description: The Palestinian militant group Hamas says it has chosen Yahya Sinwar, its top official in Gaza who masterminded the Oct. 7 attacks in Israel, as its new leader.

description: Minnesota Sen. Amy Klobuchar calls Gov. Tim Walz a close friend and breaks down the reasons why she thinks he is the best choice as Vice President Kamala Harris' running mate. Klobuchar joins CBS News with her take on the 2024 race.

description: Ahead of mortgage interest rate cuts to come, homebuyers should make these five critical moves right now.

description: Sources close to Vice President Kamala Harris' running mate selection process say she hit it off with Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz during the vetting process and pointed to his record in public service. CBS News chief White House correspondent Nancy Cordes and CBS News Minnesota's Caroline Cummings break down what's known about Harris' pick. Plus, JD Vance rallies voters in Pennsylvania with his thoughts on Walz.
title: Why Kamala Harris chose Tim Walz for 2024 VP running mate

description: Police chiefs in the U.K. said an extra 2,200 riot-trained officers would be deployed across the country amid ongoing far-right riots and demonstrations fueled by misinformation online.

description: Israel and its allies are preparing for retaliatory attacks by Iran after carrying out an operation that killed a senior Hamas leader. CBS News' Ramy Inocencio has more from Jerusalem.

description: Hilton Head Island Mayor Alan Perry is encouraging residents to stay home after  Tropical Storm Debby dumped more than 10 inches of rain in the region and as risks of floods continue. Perry joins CBS News with more information for residents and tourists in the South Carolina area.

description: Marcia Fudge, the co-chair of the Harris presidential campaign and the former housing and urban development secretary, joins CBS News with her take on Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz, Vice President Kamala Harris' pick for running mate.

description: JD Vance, former President Donald Trump's running mate, is already targeting Pennsylvania Gov. Tim Walz after Vice President Kamala Harris announced him as her VP pick. CBS News campaign reporter Taurean Small reports from Vance's campaign rally in Pennsylvania Tuesday.

description: Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz, Vice President Kamala Harris' running mate pick, has a history of appealing to rural moderate voters. Waltz also served in the House of Representatives before becoming a governor. CBS News chief White House correspondent Nancy Cordes breaks down Walz's appeal, and Minnesota Sen. Amy Klobuchar shares more about her working relationship with Harris' running mate.

description: After years of absence, giant pandas return to the San Diego Zoo, a symbol of U.S.-China conservation efforts.

description: Giant pandas will make their public debut this week at the San Diego Zoo. It's a big momentum shift for panda diplomacy after concerns that China would not continue the partnership. They're the first new set of giant pandas in 21 years.

description: Republicans and Democrats are issuing statements after Vice President Kamala Harris selected Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz to be her running mate. CBS News congressional correspondent Nikole Killion has more on what they're saying and Democratic strategist Ashley Etienne joined CBS News to discuss how the Harris-Walz campaign may push back on GOP criticism.
title: Lawmakers react to Tim Walz's selection as Kamala Harris' running mate

description: Former Minnesota Governor Tim Pawlenty, a Republican, joined CBS News to talk about Kamala Harris' selection of the current Minnesota governor, Tim Walz, as her running mate. "I know him, I've done a bunch of stuff with him over the years. I like him," Pawlenty said about Walz, "My only problem with him is policy views."
title: Former Minnesota Gov. Tim Pawlenty on Gov. Tim Walz being Kamala Harris' VP pick

description: Vice President Kamala Harris has officially selected Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz as her running mate, saying in a statement posted to social media, "As a governor, a coach, a teacher, and a veteran, [Walz has] delivered for working families like his." CBS News senior White House correspondent Weijia Jiang has more.
title: Kamala Harris makes statement on Gov. Tim Walz's selection as running mate

description: Vice President Kamala Harris will tour several swing states with her new running mate, Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz. CBS News executive director of elections and surveys Anthony Salvanto has more on how choosing Walz may affect Harris' standing in battleground states.

description: Vice President Kamala Harris will run for president with Gov. Tim Walz as her running mate. CBS News political reporter Hunter Woodall has more on Walz's record and how the Trump campaign is responding.

description: Vice President Kamala Harris, who earned 99% of delegate votes at the DNC virtual roll call vote to formalize her status as the Democratic nominee, will officially introduce the country to her vice presidential running mate on Tuesday. The two will kick off a multi-day campaigning tour of battleground states, starting in Philadelphia.
title: What we know about Kamala Harris' running mate search

description: Vice President Kamala Harris announced her running mate as Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz after weeks of speculation. Also, Tropical Storm Debby slowly makes its way across the Southeast. All that and all that matters in today's Eye Opener.

description: Vice President Kamala Harris has named Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz to be her running mate, with the two kicking off a swing state blitz in Pennsylvania Tuesday. Hyma Moore, former director of the DNC chair, joined CBS News to discuss what to expect from their campaign.

description: The missing were identified by a relative as a family of four from Troy, Texas - Mary and David Maynard, and sons Colton, 11, and Brantley, 7.

description: House Speaker Emerita Nancy Pelosi is the only woman to serve as Speaker of the House. In her new book, "The Art of Power: My Story as America's First Woman Speaker of the House," she shares insights from nearly 40 years in Congress and four terms as Speaker.
title: Nancy Pelosi on new book, what Kamala Harris brings to the Democratic party

description: Vice President Kamala Harris has selected Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz to be her running mate, completing the Democrat's ticket for the 2024 presidential election. CBS News Minnesota reporter Pauleen Le has more from Walz's home in St. Paul, Minnesota.

description: Parents looking to help their kids pay for college-related costs should consider the benefits of Parent PLUS loans.

description: If Harris and Walz ultimately win the election and move on to the White House, his wife, Gwen Walz, would become second lady of the United States.

description: On this edition of CBS Mornings Deals, Elizabeth Werner shows us items that might just become essentials in your everyday life. Visit cbsdeals.com to take advantage of these exclusive deals today. CBS earns commissions on purchases made through cbsdeals.com.

description: Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump has released a statement bashing Gov. Tim Walz after Kamala Harris picked the Minnesota governor to be her running mate. CBS News campaign reporter Jake Rosen has more.
title: Trump releases statement on Tim Walz, says he's a dangerously liberal extremist

description: A federal judge in Washington declared on Monday that Google has been operating as an illegal monopoly and violating antitrust laws. It's a victory for the U.S. Department of Justice, which sued Google for illegally paying about $26 billion in 2021 to companies to make Google the default search engine on phones and computers, shutting down rivals. Google and its parent company, Alphabet, plan to appeal the landmark ruling.
title: Google loses antitrust case in landmark ruling

description: Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz will be Vice President Kamala Harris' running mate on the Democratic ticket for the 2024 election. CBS News political reporter Hunter Woodall has more on how Walz was picked and where he stands on issues.
title: How Kamala Harris came to pick Tim Walz for running mate

description: Vice President Kamala Harris has selected Minnesota Governor Tim Walz to be her running mate in her 2024 run for the White House. Sean Sullivan, campaign editor for the Washington Post, joined CBS News to discuss Walz's background.
title: What to know about Gov. Tim Walz, Kamala Harris' pick for running mate

description: After a Monday that saw USA gymnastics end their Paris Games with more medals, it's a key day for several other U.S. Olympians and teams Tuesday. Noah Lyles will run the 200-meter semifinal while the men's basketball team faces Brazil in their quarterfinals and the women's soccer team will face Germany in their semifinal. CBS News and Sports correspondent Dana Jacobson has more.
title: Team USA wraps up Olympic gymnastics competition; several teams in knockout play

description: Vice President Kamala Harris and Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz will be at the Liacouras Center in North Philadelphia Tuesday. An expert explains why candidates campaign in the region so often.
title: Why Harris and Walz picked Pennsylvania for first joint rally

description: Vice President Kamala Harris has selected Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz to be her running mate, tapping a Midwestern progressive to join her on the ticket heading into November's election. Gayle King anchored CBS News' special report on Harris' choice.
title: Kamala Harris picks Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz as running mate | Special Report

description: As Tropical Storm Debby moves up the East Coast, about 1,900 flights were canceled and about 9,000 were delayed on Monday, affecting major airports in Orlando, Tampa, Miami and Charlotte. More cancellations expected today.
title: Tropical Storm Debby causes major flight delays across East Coast

description: While Tim Walz might not be a household name, his political star has been on the rise in recent weeks after making several viral cable news appearances.
title: Harris running mate Tim Walz's accomplishments, setbacks during his time as Minnesota governor

description: Simone Biles won silver in the individual floor final of women's gymnastics, while teammate Jordan Chiles took home silver as the gymnastics competition came to a close. Brazilian gymnast Rebeca Andrade won gold in the event, marking the first time three Black gymnasts shared an Olympic podium.
title: Simone Biles takes silver, Jordan Chiles wins bronze in women's gymnastics floor final

description: CBS News business analyst Jill Schlesinger explains the status of the markets as they show signs of recovery after big losses on Monday. Japan's top stock index gained over 10% overnight. The Dow, Nasdaq and S&P are also up after falling.
title: Markets show signs of recovery after plummeting over fears of U.S. recession

description: Now a tropical storm that could cause catastrophic flooding in Georgia and South Carolina, Debby made landfall Monday as a Category 1 hurricane in Florida. The storm system is responsible for at least five deaths.
title: Debby turns deadly after making landfall in Florida as a Category 1 hurricane

description: Kamala Harris has selected Tim Walz, the popular two-term governor of Minnesota, as her VP running mate, selecting a Midwestern Democrat to join her on the ticket.
title: Kamala Harris picks Tim Walz as VP running mate for 2024 election

description: President Biden has approved an emergency declaration for South Carolina as Tropical Storm Debby, which made landfall in Florida as a Category 1 hurricane Monday, is expected to dump over 30 inches of rain on South Carolina.
title: Tropical Storm Debby could cause catastrophic flooding in South Carolina

description: Democratic party strategist and CBS News contributor Ashley Etienne breaks down Vice President Kamala Harris' final running mate candidates.

description: Fears of a U.S. recession appear to be easing Tuesday with most equities rallying after the stock market plunged on Monday. Martin Baccardax, senior editor and chief markets correspondent for TheStreet, joined CBS News to discuss the economy.
title: Major market indexes show signs of recovery after stock market selloff on Monday

description: Tropical Storm Debby is bringing heavy rain and flooding to Georgia after killing at least five people Monday when it made landfall in Florida as a Category 1 hurricane. CBS News national correspondent Manuel Bojorquez has more on the areas Debby's hitting and meteorologist Jordan Steele has a look at the forecast.
title: At least 5 dead in Florida as Debby continues track up East Coast

description: Dave Hogbin was killed by a crocodile after he fell from a steep bank into the Annan River in Queensland state, his family said.

description: Vice President Kamala Harris will announce her running mate Tuesday before appearing with her VP choice Tuesday at a rally in Philadelphia. CBS News campaign reporter Aaron Navarro has more.

description: A test run meant to allow Olympic athletes to familiarize themselves with the marathon swimming course in the Seine River was canceled Tuesday over concerns about water quality.

description: Meanwhile, a key organizer of Bangladesh's student protests has called for Nobel Peace Prize laureate Muhammad Yunus to head an interim government.

description: These deals won't last long.

description: Illegal logging was apparently taking place on Mashco Piro territory and one logger was injured in the attack, according to a regional Indigenous organization.

description: Siddhant Vitthal Patil, 26, was one of two men who drowned over the July 4th weekend, park officials said.
title: Body recovered month after tourist drowns at Glacier National Park

description: The day after the shooting at a Trump rally in Pennsylvania, the internet saw a huge spike in calls for violence, and in particular an increase in calls for a modern-day civil war, researchers say.
title: After Trump shooting, calls for violence and civil war spiked online

description: With all eyes on the ocean during the final day of the Paris Olympics surfing competition in Tahiti, a whale breached and gave spectators and photographers an amazing Olympics moment.

description: Most equities rallied Tuesday after the previous day's global rout fueled by U.S. recession fears that have led to calls for the Federal Reserve Board to cut interest rates before its next meeting.

description: One step closer to gold, Team USA basketball moves on to the knockout round of the 2024 Summer Olympics Games.

description: Team USA women's soccer (USWNT) faces Germany today. Find out how and when to watch today's Olympic soccer game.

description: Tropical Storm Debby moved menacingly into some of America's most historic Southern cities and was expected to bring prolonged downpours and flooding throughout the day Tuesday.
title: "Catastrophic" flooding possible from slow-moving Tropical Storm Debby

description: The Pennsylvania governor's record has been under scrutiny as he remains a contender to be Harris' VP pick.
title: A look at Josh Shapiro's legal controversies

description: Kamala Harris received 99% of the delegate votes in the Democratic National Committee's early virtual roll call vote, which ended Monday evening.
title: DNC virtual roll call vote ends with Harris receiving 99% of delegate votes

description: Compared with a year ago, 3.4 million more Americans do not have health insurance.
title: Share of Americans without health insurance climbs to 8.2% in CDC survey

description: The stock market took a big slide Monday following a lackluster jobs report and growing fears of a recession in the next year. Jo Ling Kent breaks down what it all means.
title: Stocks fall as fears of recession increase

description: Lumberton, North Carolina, sits 80 miles inland but it was still inundated with flood water from 2016's Hurricane Matthew and 2018's Hurricane Florence.
title: North Carolina communities, flooded before, brace for Debby

description: As oceans and the atmosphere warm, the risk of inland flooding from hurricanes and tropical storms grows. Mark Strassmann takes a look at a North Carolina community that's already learned that lesson twice.
title: Inland communities increasingly susceptible to flooding from hurricanes

description: Simone Biles won silver in the women's gymnastics individual floor final at the Paris Olympics on Monday. Earlier falls on the balance beam, including falls by Biles and Suni Lee, left the U.S. out of individual medals contention in that apparatus. "CBS Saturday Morning" co-host and CBS News and sports correspondent Dana Jacobson is in Paris with a recap.
title: Simone Biles wins silver in women's gymnastics floor final

description: As the former U.S. ambassador to Russia, John Sullivan has rare insight when it comes to the inner workings of the Kremlin. He was also in Moscow the night Putin's army invaded Ukraine in 2022. Sullivan joins CBS News to discuss his new memoir, "Midnight in Moscow," and the future of U.S.-Russia diplomacy.
title: Former U.S. ambassador to Russia on current state of relations

description: Israel and its allies are preparing for an Iranian strike after the killing of a senior Hamas official last week in Tehran. President Biden met with his national security team at the White House situation room Monday. CBS News' Debora Patta and Ed O'Keefe have the details.
title: Biden meets with national security team amid Middle East tensions

description: Tropical Storm Debby is making its way north to the Georgia and South Carolina coasts. Both state's governors have declared states of emergency to prepare for heavy rains and severe floods. CBS News correspondent Cristian Benavides has the latest from Savannah, Georgia.
title: Tropical Storm Debby making its way northeast

description: A federal judge ruled against tech giant Google in a major antitrust case on Monday. The ruling says the company acted illegally to maintain a monopoly of its search engine. CBS News legal contributor Jessica Levinson joins to unpack the decision.
title: Google maintained illegal search engine monopoly, judge rules

description: Vice President Kamala Harris is expected to announce her running mate Tuesday morning. Harris is set to hold a rally in Pennsylvania later that day alongside her VP pick. CBS News chief election and campaign correspondent Robert Costa has more.
title: Harris to kick off battleground state tour after VP pick announcement

description: Tropical Storm Debby was downgraded from a Category 1 hurricane after slamming into Florida on Monday. Some forecasters are predicting record-setting rainfall for parts of Georgia and South Carolina as Debby makes its way north and east. CBS News national correspondent Manuel Bojorquez reports from Charleston.
title: Georgia, South Carolina brace for Tropical Storm Debby

description: A suspected rocket attack at Al Asad Air Base in Iraq injured several U.S. personnel on Monday. CBS News intelligence and national security reporter Olivia Gazis has the latest.
title: U.S. personnel injured in suspected rocket attack on Iraq military base

description: Fears of a U.S. economic slowdown sent markets falling at the start of the trading week on Monday, with markets in Asia and Europe falling as well. CBS News senior business and tech correspondent Jo Ling Kent has more from New York.
title: Dow, S&P 500 see worst daily loss since 2022
